introduction.heading: Introduction
content: Welcome to {APP_NAME} ("the Platform", "the Service"), operated by {COMPANY_NAME}. By accessing or using our services, you agree to these Terms of Service ("Terms"). Please read them carefully.

{APP_NAME} is a fantasy console platform that enables users to create, play, and share game carts. The Platform is ad-supported and free to use. Your use of the Service is subject to these Terms and our Privacy Policy.

Take responsibility for your actions and content
Accept our Privacy Policy and License Agreement
Acknowledge that the Platform is provided "as is" without warranties

sections.heading: Service Description
content: {APP_NAME} provides:

items: A web-based platform for creating and playing game carts
The RetroForge Engine (open source, MIT licensed) for running carts
A community platform for sharing and discovering games
Ad-supported services with no subscription fees

content: The Platform is owned and operated by {COMPANY_NAME}. All rights to the Web Application and Platform infrastructure are reserved by {COMPANY_NAME}.

sections.heading: Account Registration
content: {APP_NAME} uses KeyPair-based authentication for maximum user privacy. We do not collect:

items: Email addresses
Phone numbers
Real names or personal contact information
Any personally identifiable information

content: Users are identified solely by cryptographic key pairs. You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account keys.

content: When you create a cart on {APP_NAME}:

items: You retain ownership of the intellectual property in your cart
You grant {COMPANY_NAME} a worldwide, royalty-free license to host, display, and distribute your cart on the {APP_NAME} platform
You represent that you have the right to create and publish the cart

content: All carts, whether published or unpublished, are subject to the distribution restrictions outlined in these Terms.

sections.heading: Cart Distribution Restrictions
content: Carts created on {APP_NAME} are EXCLUSIVE to the RetroForge platform. You agree NOT to:

items: Distribute cart files (.rf) directly to others (share links to the Arcade page instead)
Publish or distribute your cart on any other website, platform, or service
Embed or display your cart on other websites (you may embed the Arcade page)
Create bundled binaries (engine + cart) for distribution outside the {APP_NAME} web application

content: These restrictions apply to ALL carts, whether published or unpublished. The only exception is sharing links to Arcade pages, which is permitted and encouraged.
Bundled binaries (engine + cart) are available for download from Arcade pages and are subject to the same distribution restrictions as cart files.

Content that violates third-party intellectual property rights

content: {COMPANY_NAME} reserves the right to remove any content that violates these restrictions.

sections.heading: User Monetization
content: Users may receive voluntary tips or donations for their carts through:

items: PayPal
Patreon
Other third-party tipping platforms (as long as free APIs are available)

content: Users may NOT charge a set price for carts. All carts must be available free of charge on the {APP_NAME} platform.
The Platform itself is monetized solely through advertising. Ads appear on all pages (for both visitors and developers) and are our only source of income.

content: {APP_NAME} is an ad-supported platform. By using the Service, you acknowledge that:

items: Advertising is our only source of revenue
Ads appear on all pages (visitor and developer pages)
Ads will remain visible when Arcade pages are embedded on other websites

content: Ad revenue is essential to maintaining the free service. Users may not block or circumvent advertising on the Platform.
